replies.message: Hi Sheila, it’s clear that recycling rates have stalled and there’s a need to address the issue of recycling and on-the-go littering. We believe supporting the introduction of a well –designed deposit returns scheme in Scotland may help improve recycling rates. However, as the introduction of a full deposit returns scheme is a complex process and takes time, rather than wait, we want to test and understand how a small financial incentive can change peoples’ behaviour and what impact it can have on littering and recycling of soft drinks packaging.
